verses.kjv: Blessed is every one that feareth the LORD; that walketh in his ways.
verses.ct: How fortunate is everyone who is wholeheartedly dedicated to the LORD, who lives according to his ways.

verses.kjv: For thou shalt eat the labour of thine hands: happy shalt thou be, and it shall be well with thee.
verses.ct: You will enjoy the fruit of your own hard work; you will be happy, and things will go well for you.

verses.kjv: Thy wife shall be as a fruitful vine by the sides of thine house: thy children like olive plants round about thy table.
verses.ct: Your wife will be like a productive vine growing alongside your home; your children will be like young olive trees gathered around your table.

verses.kjv: Behold, that thus shall the man be blessed that feareth the LORD.
verses.ct: Look — this is how the person who is wholeheartedly dedicated to the LORD will be blessed.

verses.kjv: The LORD shall bless thee out of Zion: and thou shalt see the good of Jerusalem all the days of thy life.
verses.ct: May the LORD bless you from Zion, and may you experience the prosperity of Jerusalem every day of your life.

verses.kjv: Yea, thou shalt see thy children’s children, and peace upon Israel.
verses.ct: May you live to see your grandchildren, and may there be peace over Israel.
